org.platanios.learn.math.statistics

Class StatisticsUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.platanios.learn.math.statistics.StatisticsUtilities

  • public class StatisticsUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static methods performing some common statistics-related operations.
    Author:
    Emmanouil Antonios Platanios

      • shuffle

        public static <T> void shuffle(T[] array)
        Shuffles the order of the elements in the provided array using Knuth's shuffle algorithm.
        Parameters:

      • shuffle

        public static <T> void shuffle(java.util.List<T> list)
        Shuffles the order of the elements in the provided list using Knuth's shuffle algorithm.
        Parameters:
        list - The list whose elements are shuffled.

      • sampleWithoutReplacement

        public static <T> T[] sampleWithoutReplacement(T[] array,
                                               int numberOfSamples)
        Randomly samples a specified number of elements from an array without replacement. Note that this method modifies the provided array (i.e., it shuffles the order of its elements).
        Parameters:
        array - The array from which we randomly sample elements.
        numberOfSamples - The number of elements to sample from the given list.
        Returns:
        A new array containing the sampled elements.

      • sampleWithoutReplacement

        public static <T> java.util.List<T> sampleWithoutReplacement(java.util.List<T> list,
                                                             int numberOfSamples)
        Randomly samples a specified number of elements from a list without replacement. Note that this method modifies the provided list (i.e., it shuffles the order of its elements).
        Parameters:
        list - The list from which we randomly sample elements.
        numberOfSamples - The number of elements to sample from the given list.
        Returns:
        A new ArrayList containing the sampled elements.
